content: copyright © helen shrimpton 2019 all rights reserved this beautiful new cal crochet a-long will be hosted in the facebook group helen s hookaholics 1 ♥ the cal will run for 9 weeks starting friday 26th july with the final part on friday 20th september ♥ each part will be posted on friday evening 7pm bst uk time ♥ each week you will find the pdf to download from my website there will be links posted in the facebook group helen s hookaholics and a special file with links to all the information you will need ♥ there will be a choice of us terms and uk terms in both photo tutorial and written only pattern and also full video tutorial support in us terms for yarn requirements and all other information please read the introducing sacred space crochet a-long 2 post on my website for all of the weekly parts please visit the sacred space 3 cal page on my website 1 https //www facebook com/groups/helenshookaholics/ 2 https //crystalsandcrochet com/crochet/introducing-sacred-space-crochet-a-long/ 3 https //crystalsandcrochet com/crochet/category/sacred-space/
